topic.title: How to Display Index Terms and Page Numbers inline

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p:
By default, the page numbers referencing each index term are displayed beneath the term. This behavior can be overridden to render page numbers inline with their associated terms. The goal here is to render the following elements on the same line:
index/formatted-value This element contains the index term text.
index/refid This element contains the list of links for the given term (as page numbers).
